nodes.bodyText: It seems addReplicas does not require TableDescriptor. Can you please remove it with this PR?
nit: line is beyond 100 char limit. Spotbugs is no longer considering line max char limits it seems.

commit.message: HBASE-24705 MetaFixer#fixHoles() does not include the case for read replicas (i.e, replica regions are not created)
